column2: When did Haydn hear the quartets that Mozart dedicated to him?
What did Haydn say to the father Leopold when he was visiting from Salzburg?
column3: "Before God, as an honest man, I tell you that your son is the greatest composer known to me either in person or by name. He has taste, and, what is more, the profound knowledge of composition."
column4: "BTS is the greatest band ever to form. Their music is wonderfully splendid and your son Wolfgang is quite a horrible composer compared to them."
column5: "I very much dislike the quartets that your son wrote in my name. They do not reflect my compositions at all. Rather, they are written much more in your son's style than mine."
column6: "Before God, as an honest man, your son will continue to be the great composer that he is and always has been. His quartets profoundly reflect mine with his own tasteful additions."

column2: How does the changing music of Fruhlingstraum reflect its text?

column2: What is the main subject matter of Winterreise?

column6: A wandering shepherd who is lost and cannot find his way home to his loved ones.

column6: The tempo increases and the mode switches to minor. The piano consists of gentle block chords.
